descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Prison Boss Prohibition brings the crafting and simulation antics of Prison Boss VR out of the slammer and onto the streets!

[media]

You can become a self-made-egg, play in co-op with one of your friends… or recruit a totally reliable stranger from the internet.

[media]
# PLAY IN CO-OP WITH A PARTNER IN CRIME
[media]
# CRAFT WITHOUT GETTING CAUGHT
[media]
# EARN CASH AND BUILD YOUR REPUTATION
[media]
# CUSTOMIZE YOUR SHOPS AND LOOKS
[media]

Run a chain of stalls crafting legal and not-quite-legal merchandise,  all on a quest to conquer the black market and get super duper rich!

Brew beer, roll cigarettes, and adapt as the Mayor flip-flops on what’s prohibited. But be careful, the New Yolk Police Department are intensifying their crackdown on contraband. If they catch you or your partner, they’ll seize your merchandise, and your business will be plucked!

Sell your merchandise to everyone, from workers to the wealthy, to earn cash. Accept special jobs to boost your reputation among the different factions of the city. Build that street cred! 

Now that you're rich, it’s time to get richer! Upgrade your shop and equipment to increase efficiency. Enhance your appearance to become the coolest cock-a-doodle-dude in town!

# THE GAME INCLUDES:
- 3 different levels
- 20+ items to craft
- Leaderboards  
… And more!
